mem[0] = 32'b00000000100000000000000011101111; // jal x1, 8 
mem[1] = 32'b00000000000100000000000001110011; // ebreak 
mem[2] = 32'b00000000010000000000000100010011; // addi x2, x0, 4 
mem[3] = 32'b00000000001000000000000110010011; // addi x3, x0, 2 
mem[4] = 32'b00000000001100010000000010110011; // add x1, x2, x3
